fields.name: IgnoreConflictingHostNames
fields.description:
If true, custom hostname conflicts will be ignored when recovering to a target web app.
This setting is only necessary when RecoverConfiguration is enabled.

fields.name: Overwrite
fields.description: If true the restore operation can overwrite source app; otherwise, false.

fields.name: RecoverConfiguration
fields.description: If true, site configuration, in addition to content, will be reverted.

fields.name: RecoverySource
fields.description:
Optional. Specifies the web app that snapshot contents will be retrieved from.
If empty, the targeted web app will be used as the source.

fields.name: SnapshotTime
fields.description: Point in time in which the app restore should be done, formatted as a DateTime string.

fields.name: UseDRSecondary
fields.description: If true, the snapshot is retrieved from DRSecondary endpoint.
